headline: NRG Energy Rethinks Growth With Data Center Deals And LS Power Fleet
summary: NRG Energy (NYSE:NRG) is shifting toward long-term contracts with data centers under a bring your own power model. The company is integrating LS Power’s gas fired generation assets, which has already doubled NRG’s generation capacity. This combination of contracted data center demand and a larger generation fleet is reshaping how NRG approaches growth and risk. At a share price of $178.96, NRG Energy sits in the market spotlight as investors watch how this new contract focused approach...

headline: Assessing NRG Energy (NRG) Valuation After Strong Recent Share Price Momentum
summary: Event context and recent performance NRG Energy (NRG) has drawn investor attention recently, with the stock showing a return of about 15% over the past month and roughly 6% over the past 3 months. See our latest analysis for NRG Energy. That recent 15.4% 1 month share price return, on top of a 7.7% year to date share price return, sits against a very large 3 year total shareholder return. This suggests momentum has been strong even with the latest 1 day pullback. If NRG Energy’s run has you...
